trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> modes within the property grid .
trans-unit.target: Representerar en knapp som gör att användaren kan växla mellan de olika <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>lägen i egenskapsrutnätet.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Determines what type of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"></xref> to display upon receipt of a <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs> event.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer vilken typ av <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"> </xref> ska visas vid mottagning av en <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> and if that is <xref:System.Boolean.True>, sets up the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> to be the mode to switch to.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerar om den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>har ändrats (eller erfarenheter eller tappas bort) dess ägande <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>och om det vill säga <xref:System.Boolean.True>, ställer in den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>ska växla till läget.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som, när <xref:System.Boolean.True>, innebär att den <> </> *> beräknas automatiskt så att den matchar den <> </> *> äga <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: Annars kan växla till läget kommer att baseras på den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> växlar automatiskt till redigeringsläget av dess <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property which, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerar beroendeegenskapen som, när <xref:System.Boolean.True>, innebär att den <> </> *> beräknas automatiskt så att den matchar den <> </> *> äga <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: Annars kan växla till läget kommer att baseras på den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: The edit mode to switch to when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Redigeringsläget växla till när den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> klickas.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Registrerar beroendeegenskap som hämtar eller anger det aktuella läget när den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> klickas.
